properties.description: Whilst most people can pay for food and drinks if anyone is struggling we can provide some refreshments from our pay it forward scheme x We are a very busy cafe but offer a warm space for people to sit and chat and if a cup of tea is needed we can provide from our pay it forward scheme. Please note you will be sat with other people on a sharing table
properties.title: mooch Cafe87
